overview: Amy, a young girl on the fringe, is being chased by the police, and she happens to meet wax figure artist Xia Feng. Feng is a perfectionist, and uses harsh methods to force Amy to reform. When Amy became a lady, she met her boyfriend Tony again. Feng is very upset when he finds out, then Tony disappears for no reason. Amy also finds out that Feng is not only psychopathic, but also collects wax figures. Amy is terrified, will it become another masterpiece of Feng?
title: Dark Obsession
